column1: Apaseo el Alto is a Mexican city and municipality located in the state of Guanajuato. The municipality has an area of 491.81 square kilometres (1.6% of the surface of the state) and is bordered to the north by Apaseo el Grande
column2: to the east by the state of Querataro
column3: to the south by Jerécuaro and Tarimoro
column4: and to the northwest by Celaya. The municipality had a population of 56
column5: 817 inhabitants according to the 2005 census.In pre-Columbian times Apaseo (Apatzeo) was known as Atlayahualco or "place of where water flows" by the Otomí people who lived in the region.

column1: The municipal president of Apaseo el Alto and its many smaller outlying communities
column2: which include San Juan del Llanito
column4: is Dr. Miguel Ángel Sánchez Escutia
